name: Clicky Slingy Rope
description:
Clicky Slingy Rope

Basic Movement : "A" and "D" keys to add left and right forces to the player.

Grapple using Mouse button.

Spawn/ Generate hook: Use "Right Control" to generate the hook to grapple and add force to swing  using "A" and "D" key. High force will be generated if you "Grapple + use left or right key and release the mouse button"

Press Space to shoot enemies, which will help you to take some health in-case you lost any.

Feedbacks will be much appreciated!
